product.title: vB Web-Mail
product.description: Adds a webmail client to vB to access POP3 based mailboxes

<if condition="is_browser('mozilla')">
	<script type="text/javascript">
	<!--
	function exec_refresh()
	{
		window.status = "$vbphrase[redirecting]" + myvar;
		myvar = myvar + " .";
		var timerID = setTimeout("exec_refresh();", 100);
		if (timeout > 0)
		{
			timeout -= 1;
		}
		else
		{
			clearTimeout(timerID);
			window.status = "";
			window.location = "$js_url";
		}
	}
	
	var myvar = "";
	var timeout = 20;
	exec_refresh();
	//-->
	</script>
<else />
	<meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="2; URL=$url" />
</if>

plugin.title: Template Manipulation (Add WMail Links)

phrasetype.name: Control Panel Global
phrasetype.phrase:
Table setup complete.
Now heading for the bitfields....

Please wait....

This option allows to repair your installation of WMail in case something went wrong

All missing tables or table manipulations will be re-created, no existing data will be altered!

Use this when you get SQL errors while running WMail.
Can use the WMail Webmail Client

phrasetype.name: WMail Phrases
phrasetype.phrase:
This is your addressbook.
Add, edit and delete possible reciepients here.
Choose editor to use for writing new mail

Click here for your complete
inbox content.
Maximum length of subject lines in inbox list (in characters)

An error accoured while trying to download the attachment!

This may accour when the connection to your POP3 server fails, or you specified an non-existant attachment ID.

The "TO" field can't be left empty!
Please fill in a recipient and try again.
An error accoured while connecting to your POP3 server!

There has been an error while talking to your SMTP server!
Sessionlog follows:

powered by WMail - POP3/SMTP Client for vBulletin
(c)2006 by HELLCAT

Welcome {1}.

You have a total of {2} mails in your inbox,
that's {3} new mails since your last check.

Usually the login detail you enter here are saved into the forum's database,
so you never need to enter them again.
However, if you do not want this, you can choose to save the login details
in a cookie on your local computer.
Usually you do not have to re-enter this information unless the cookie gets deleted
or you're using a different computer.
Automatically redirect back to "Write New Mail" page after sending
Sender Realname (FROM field in outgoing mail)
Signature to automatically append to all new mails

VERSION MISMATCH DETECTED!
There is a version inconsistancy in the supplemental files,
please inform system admin!

phrasetype.name: WMail AdminCP Phrases
phrasetype.phrase:
Here, you can enter values to override certain settings of the user configuration.
Leave a field empty, or clear it, to not to override this setting.
The user is unable to apply own values to overridden options, always the ones entered here will be used!

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: This option allows you to enable/disable the automatic addition of a "Webmail" link to the navbar (behind "Faq").

Here you can choose for what users the automatically added links should be added.
Only for users having permission to use the webmailer, for all users or completely disable the automatic insertion of links.

If you choose one of the enabled options you can turn each link on and off separately below.
Automatically add links to the webmailer?
This option allows you to enable/disable the automatic addition of a "Webmail" link to the Quicklinks list.
This option allows you to enable/disable the automatic addition of a "Webmail" link in the UserCP (above PMs).
